plot: A highschool student suffers from depression, resentment, and lonliness when he is forced to repeat his final year but his friend's are accepted into college
title: Daehakyalgae
plot_es: A highschool student suffers from depression, resentment, and lonliness when he is forced to repeat his final year but his friend's are accepted into college
plot_en: A highschool student suffers from depression, resentment, and lonliness when he is forced to repeat his final year but his friend's are accepted into college
